name: over-react-format-on-save
description: A Dart project formatting tool that enables formatting on file save. Attempts to use OverReact Format but defaults to dartfmt.

formatOnSave.customLineLength.Title: Custom Line-Length
formatOnSave.customLineLength.description: The line-length the formatter should use. Note that both this and `Detect Custom Line-Length` cannot be set at the same time. If this is set (i.e. greater than 0) and `Detect Custom Line-Length` is `true`, this property will take precedence.

formatOnSave.detectCustomLineLength.Title: Detect Custom Line-Length
formatOnSave.detectCustomLineLength.description: Attempt to autodetect custom line-length. If you are using Dart Dev have a `tool/dart_dev/config.dart` file with a custom line-length defined, you can set this to true to use that line-length.
